short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finding trademarks and keywords made easy on several platforms like Amazon, eBay, Etsy, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users to easily find trademarks by brands or keywords on several websites, like Amazon, eBay, Etsy and so on. Users who sell on these platforms can use this extension to verify and to avoid trademark violation.
